name: Courager
description:
COURAGER

Is very colorful and dynamic Arcade game where you play as courage the protagonist who has to beat an endless run of five different mini-games inspired by emotions, each time you win a videogame you get points and the difficulty increases.

we recommend playing in full screen

HOW TO PLAY THE MINIGAMES

PUCH MINIGAME

  • you have to lock the fists with the keys W A S D be aware of warning signals to prevent punches

ANGRY MINIGAME

  • you have to burn the ropes with the fires that anger man throws, while you move with A D you crouch with S and jump with space

FALLING MINIGAME

  • you have to dodge the platforms with spikes moving with A D plus you can take out a parachute using the space

BLUE MINIGAME

  • you have to quickly press space and when I say fast it is very very fast as if your life depended on it

TARGET MINIGAME

  • you have to follow the target with the mouse

thanks for playing and we appreciate your feedback .

ENJOY IT!!
